properties.comment: Add settings for CA-Sat-Fri Mar 30 13:12:06 JST 2012-Rev1.31.dev18
properties.entry: -threads 0 -s 512x384 -acodec aac -ab 128k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -vcodec libx264 -aspect 4:3 -crf 23 -coder 1 -sws_flags lanczos -flags +loop -cmp +chroma -partitions +parti4x4+partp8x8+partb8x8 -me_method umh -subq 8 -me_range 16 -g 250 -keyint_min 25 -sc_threshold 40 -i_qfactor 0.71 -b_strategy 2 -qcomp 0.6 -qmin 17 -qmax 51 -qdiff 4 -bf 3 -refs 3 -direct-pred auto -trellis 1 -weightp 1 -mixed-refs -8x8dct 1 -fast-pskip 1 -pix_fmt yuv420p
